translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「シィルさんも。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Seal-san as well.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 手紙で伺いましたが、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I heard from the letter,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 本当に氷から解放されたんですね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: that you were truly freed from the ice."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ご挨拶が遅れてすみません、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Sorry for the late greeting,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: またお会い出来て嬉しいです！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I'm glad to see you again!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「しかし、何故ここに香ちゃんが？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "But, why is Kaoru-chan here?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス達の顔を見て表情をパッと華やがせた香が、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Kaoru, who brightened up instantly at seeing Rance and the others,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その言葉で、すぐに顔を暗く沈ませた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: immediately darkened her face at those words.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……とても、大事なお願いがあって参りました」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...I have come with a very important request."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あのー……
何があったのか、私達まだサッパリで……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: we still have no clue what happened..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そうだ、いい加減に説明しろ説明」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "That's right, enough already, explain it!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そうですね……」
「では、私の口から説明させて頂きます」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Then, allow me to explain from my side."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「今、人類国家は滅亡の危機に瀕しています」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Right now, the human nations are facing the brink of extinction."
"...Why is that?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「LP7年9月17日、今から二週間ほど前、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "On LP Year 7, September 17th, about two weeks ago,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔人ケイブリス率いる魔軍の大軍団が
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: a massive demon army led by the demon lord Cavebris

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 攻めてきました」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: attacked."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「地図をご覧下さい」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Please look at the map."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「リーザス、ゼス、ヘルマン、自由都市、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "The four great powers - Leazas, Zeth, Herman, and the Free Cities,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスもご存じの四つの大国が同時に攻め込まれました」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: which even Rance knows of - were attacked simultaneously."
"...What is the situation on the battlefield?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「かなり危険な状態です」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "It is a very dangerous state."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「各国も長年、魔軍に対し警戒し、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "All countries have long been on alert against the demon army,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 大陸西の魔物界への防備を重ねていましたが……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and have been strengthening defenses against the monster realm in the western continent..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「何故か魔軍は、魔物界と人類側の国境からではなく、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "However, strangely, the demon army did not invade from the border between the monster realm and the human side,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 世界の中心地点、キナニ砂漠から侵攻してきました」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but instead invaded from the central point of the world, the Kinani Desert."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「予想していなかった地点からの攻撃に
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Because the attack came from an unexpected location,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 各国は為す術がなかったそうです」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the countries had no means to counter it."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「防衛は後手後手に回り、各地で魔軍に敗退しました」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "The defense was delayed and each place was overrun by the demon army."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「既に各国の防衛軍は半壊、もう長くは保たないと思います」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "The defense forces of each country are already half destroyed; they won't hold much longer."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……えいぷりるふーる？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...April Fool's?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「いえ、現在まさに起こっている事実です」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "No, this is a fact happening right now."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ま、待て待て！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "W-Wait, wait!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「魔人ケイブリスが率いて……と、言ったな？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "You said the demon lord Cavebris is leading them, right?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それは絶対にありえない」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That is absolutely impossible."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ケイブリスは魔物界でホーネット様の軍勢と
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Cavebris should be in the monster realm fighting Lord Hornet's army,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦っている最中の筈……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: right now... they couldn't launch such a large-scale invasion..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: こんな大規模な侵攻が出来るわけ……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: There’s no way such a massive invasion is possible..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「はい、長年、魔物界では魔人達が
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Yes, for many years, the demon lords have been

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ホーネット派とケイブリス派、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: divided into two factions in the monster realm - the Hornet faction and the Cavebris faction,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 二つの陣営に別れて戦争していました」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and have been at war with each other."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そのおかげで人類は魔軍に攻められず
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Thanks to that, humanity has not been attacked by the demon army,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今までは平和に過ごせていましたが……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and until now, we have been able to live in peace..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「この戦いは三ヶ月ほど前、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "This war seems to have ended about three months ago,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ケイブリス派が勝利を収めたようです」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: with the Cavebris faction victorious."
"What..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「し、信じられるかそんなこと！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I-I can't believe such a thing!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「なら、ホーネット様はどうなったんだ！？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Then, what happened to Lord Hornet!?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「敗れた魔人ホーネットの行方は、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "The whereabouts of the defeated demon lord Hornet,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その生死等、詳しいことはなにも……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: including his survival or death, are unknown..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「くっ！　シーザー！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Damn! Caesar!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ハイ、サテラ様！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Yes, Lady Satela!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「おい、どこへ行くつもりだ、サテラ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hey, where do you think you're going, Satela!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「人間の言葉なぞ信じられるか！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Can you believe the words of humans?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: サテラが、サテラの目で確認に行く！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Satela will go and see with her own eyes!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: サテラ達は玉座の間を後にした。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Satela and the others left the throne room.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「い、行ってしまいました……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "They've gone..."

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

unknown...\""},{"lineNumber":130104,"originalJapaneseLine":"「くっ！　シーザー！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Damn! Caesar!\""},{"lineNumber":130105,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ハイ、サテラ様！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Yes, Lady Satela!\""},{"lineNumber":130106,"originalJapaneseLine":"「おい、どこへ行くつもりだ、サテラ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hey, where do you think you're going, Satela!\""},{"lineNumber":130107,"originalJapaneseLine":"「人間の言葉なぞ信じられるか！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Can you believe the words of humans?"},{"lineNumber":130108,"originalJapaneseLine":"　サテラが、サテラの目で確認に行く！」","translatedEnglishLine":"Satela will go and see with her own eyes!\""},{"lineNumber":130109,"originalJapaneseLine":"サテラ達は玉座の間を後にした。","translatedEnglishLine":"Satela and the others left the throne room."},{"lineNumber":130110,"originalJapaneseLine":"「い、行ってしまいました……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"They've gone...\""}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「シィルさんも。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Seal-san as well.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 手紙で伺いましたが、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I heard from the letter,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 本当に氷から解放されたんですね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: that you were truly freed from the ice."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ご挨拶が遅れてすみません、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Sorry for the late greeting,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: またお会い出来て嬉しいです！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I'm glad to see you again!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「しかし、何故ここに香ちゃんが？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "But, why is Kaoru-chan here?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス達の顔を見て表情をパッと華やがせた香が、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Kaoru, who brightened up instantly at seeing Rance and the others,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その言葉で、すぐに顔を暗く沈ませた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: immediately darkened her face at those words.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……とても、大事なお願いがあって参りました」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...I have come with a very important request."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あのー……
何があったのか、私達まだサッパリで……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: we still have no clue what happened..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そうだ、いい加減に説明しろ説明」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "That's right, enough already, explain it!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そうですね……」
「では、私の口から説明させて頂きます」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Then, allow me to explain from my side."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「今、人類国家は滅亡の危機に瀕しています」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Right now, the human nations are facing the brink of extinction."
"...Why is that?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「LP7年9月17日、今から二週間ほど前、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "On LP Year 7, September 17th, about two weeks ago,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔人ケイブリス率いる魔軍の大軍団が
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: a massive demon army led by the demon lord Cavebris

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 攻めてきました」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: attacked."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「地図をご覧下さい」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Please look at the map."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「リーザス、ゼス、ヘルマン、自由都市、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "The four great powers - Leazas, Zeth, Herman, and the Free Cities,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスもご存じの四つの大国が同時に攻め込まれました」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: which even Rance knows of - were attacked simultaneously."
"...What is the situation on the battlefield?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「かなり危険な状態です」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "It is a very dangerous state."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「各国も長年、魔軍に対し警戒し、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "All countries have long been on alert against the demon army,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 大陸西の魔物界への防備を重ねていましたが……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and have been strengthening defenses against the monster realm in the western continent..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「何故か魔軍は、魔物界と人類側の国境からではなく、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "However, strangely, the demon army did not invade from the border between the monster realm and the human side,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 世界の中心地点、キナニ砂漠から侵攻してきました」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but instead invaded from the central point of the world, the Kinani Desert."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「予想していなかった地点からの攻撃に
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Because the attack came from an unexpected location,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 各国は為す術がなかったそうです」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the countries had no means to counter it."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「防衛は後手後手に回り、各地で魔軍に敗退しました」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "The defense was delayed and each place was overrun by the demon army."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「既に各国の防衛軍は半壊、もう長くは保たないと思います」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "The defense forces of each country are already half destroyed; they won't hold much longer."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……えいぷりるふーる？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...April Fool's?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「いえ、現在まさに起こっている事実です」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "No, this is a fact happening right now."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ま、待て待て！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "W-Wait, wait!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「魔人ケイブリスが率いて……と、言ったな？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "You said the demon lord Cavebris is leading them, right?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それは絶対にありえない」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That is absolutely impossible."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ケイブリスは魔物界でホーネット様の軍勢と
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Cavebris should be in the monster realm fighting Lord Hornet's army,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦っている最中の筈……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: right now... they couldn't launch such a large-scale invasion..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: こんな大規模な侵攻が出来るわけ……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: There’s no way such a massive invasion is possible..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「はい、長年、魔物界では魔人達が
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Yes, for many years, the demon lords have been

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ホーネット派とケイブリス派、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: divided into two factions in the monster realm - the Hornet faction and the Cavebris faction,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 二つの陣営に別れて戦争していました」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and have been at war with each other."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そのおかげで人類は魔軍に攻められず
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Thanks to that, humanity has not been attacked by the demon army,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今までは平和に過ごせていましたが……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and until now, we have been able to live in peace..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「この戦いは三ヶ月ほど前、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "This war seems to have ended about three months ago,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ケイブリス派が勝利を収めたようです」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: with the Cavebris faction victorious."
"What..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「し、信じられるかそんなこと！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I-I can't believe such a thing!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「なら、ホーネット様はどうなったんだ！？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Then, what happened to Lord Hornet!?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「敗れた魔人ホーネットの行方は、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "The whereabouts of the defeated demon lord Hornet,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その生死等、詳しいことはなにも……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: including his survival or death, are unknown..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「くっ！　シーザー！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Damn! Caesar!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ハイ、サテラ様！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Yes, Lady Satela!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「おい、どこへ行くつもりだ、サテラ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hey, where do you think you're going, Satela!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「人間の言葉なぞ信じられるか！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Can you believe the words of humans?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: サテラが、サテラの目で確認に行く！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Satela will go and see with her own eyes!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: サテラ達は玉座の間を後にした。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Satela and the others left the throne room.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「い、行ってしまいました……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "They've gone..."
